mapper.insert: insert into comment(m_nick, c_contents, c_img, c_grade, rcp_idx, c_status, c_time, c_blind, c_like) values(#{m_nick}, #{c_contents}, #{c_img}, #{c_grade}, #{rcp_idx}, 0, current_timestamp(), 0, 0)
mapper.update: update comment set c_like = c_like + 1 where c_idx = #{c_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) from comment_like where c_idx = #{c_idx} and m_idx = #{m_idx}

choose.when: DELETE FROM comment_like where c_idx = #{c_idx} and m_idx = #{m_idx}
